pages.title: Mob Interactions
pages.text: This section will explain about mob interactions - some items require interacting with mobs to acquire.
The first one has got to be the beginning of everything, the Pangaea of the legacy - the one and only Tokino Sora. Adorable.

A boss mob with very strong attacks. You can either summon her using a broken hair accessory on a normal Sora, or they can be found in their lairs (WIP). Killing one will drop a $(9)talisman of the ether$().

The beginning of Pon. A shrine maiden that can cleanse your lava and make it safe for all beings. Right click her with a lava bucket in hand while having 4 $(9)pink petals$() or 4 $(9)cherry saplings$().
A cute being, that will trade you sometimes suspicious items.
